meanings.definition: Capable of being screwed or fastened with a screw.
meanings.sent1: The wooden plank was screwable, allowing us to attach it securely to the wall.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to use a screwdriver on screwable materials to avoid damaging them.
meanings.sent3: I tried to use a banana as a screw, but it turns out bananas are not screwable!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was screwable, firmly holding her plans together like a well-fastened screw.
meanings.sent5: The idea of a self-assembling furniture set sounded screwable, but in reality, it was quite challenging.

meanings.definition: Suitable for being screwed or having sex with.
meanings.sent1: The new dating app claims to match users with screwable partners based on their interests.
meanings.sent2: In the romantic comedy, the main characters finally find their screwable soulmates after many mishaps.
meanings.sent3: The love potion turned out to be screwable, causing everyone in town to fall in love with their pets!
meanings.sent4: His smooth talk was screwable, effortlessly attracting potential partners like a magnet.
meanings.sent5: The chemistry between them was undeniably screwable, sparking a passionate and intense relationship.
